feed.title: Google Cloud: Text-to-Speech
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Text-to-Speech

entry.content: Chirp 3: HD voices now offers General Availability (GA) support for four additional Nordic languages: Danish (da-DK), Finnish (fi-FI), Norwegian Bokm√•l (nb-NO), and Swedish (sv-SE). For more information, see Chirp 3: HD voices.
entry.summary: HD voices now supports four additional Nordic languages: Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, and Swedish.
entry.title: Changed: New Nordic Languages Supported

entry.content: Chirp 3: Instant Custom Voice now extends support to ja-JP, now supporting more than 30 locales. For more information, check the Chirp 3: Instant Custom Voice documentation.
entry.summary: Instant Custom Voice now supports ja-JP, expanding its reach to over 30 locales.
entry.title: Changed: Instant Custom Voice now supports Japanese
